com.lukflug.panelstudio.widget

Class CollapsibleContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lukflug.panelstudio.component.ComponentProxy
      • com.lukflug.panelstudio.component.FocusableComponentProxy
        • com.lukflug.panelstudio.widget.Panel
          • com.lukflug.panelstudio.widget.CollapsibleContainer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IComponent, IContainer<IComponent>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ColorComponent

    public class CollapsibleContainer
extends Panel
implements IContainer<IComponent>
    Container that can be closed and scrolled, so that its children can be hidden.
